description: Single storey detached garden outbuilding (following demolition of existing outbuilding)
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

REASON: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: Location Plan; LIVARCH/4CR/101 Rev A Existing Plan & Elevations; LIVARCH/4CR/102 Rev A Proposed Plan & Elevations; LIVARCH/4CR/103 Rev A Existing Site Plan; LIVARCH/4CR/104 Rev A Proposed Site Plan.
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Development Management DPD (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 1.1 (g), 2.1 (c) and 2.10 of the Adopted Core Strategy (2012). | The detached rear outbuilding shall only be used for purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the development hereby approved, and shall not be used for habitable accommodation, as an independent dwelling or any industrial, commercial or business use.

REASON: To ensure that the development does not detract from the amenity of the adjoining properties, and to enable the Local Planning Authority to retain control over the use of the building in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021). | No kitchen facilities shall be installed in the outbuilding at any time.

REASON: To prevent the creation of a separate self-contained residential unit of accommodation in the interests of the living conditions of the existing and future residents of the site and to ensure that the use of the building does not, by reason of any other activity, harm the living conditions in the area, in accordance with policies 1.1,1.2 & 3.8 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012) and Policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), Policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
